response.original_title: Bee Smart Baby: Vocabulary Builder, Vol. 4
response.overview: Vocabulary Builder Volume 4 is the Fourth in a Series of Early Language Development Videos for Infants and Toddlers.  This series was produced in conjunction with a team of early childhood development experts to help you provide your child with essential early stimulation.
response.tagline: Interactive Learning DVD for Infants & Toddlers
response.title: Bee Smart Baby: Vocabulary Builder, Vol. 4
